WELCOME! It’s time to test your skills on 2 brand new tracks, Country Road and U-Turn.
Country Road is an intermediate track with a reasonable degree of difficulty, while the advanced difficulty of U-Turn will test even the most confident players. Do you have what it takes to gain all 3 medals?
Both tracks are also available for co-op play! It’s time to test your skills on 2 brand new tracks, Country Road and U-Turn.
Country Road is an intermediate track with a reasonable degree of difficulty, while the advanced difficulty of U-Turn will test even the most confident players. Do you have what it takes to gain all 3 medals?
Both tracks are also available for co-op play!
STORE Welcome to the Premium Store. Can’t wait for that next upgrade? A bit short on Monkey Money? Need more Tokens? Don’t worry we have everything you need right here. Welcome to the Premium Store. Need an edge against the Bloons? Need more Tokens? Don’t worry we have everything you need right here. SOCIAL Welcome to the Hall of Fame. From here you can track any achievements that you've earned in game. Welcome to the Hall of Fame. From here you can track any achievements that you've earned in game. If you have a Game Center connection you can also compete on the leaderboards and challenge your friends. MONKEY LAB Lab upgrades provide a boost in the battlefield every time you play! To fund your research, you need Tokens which you gain by beating tracks and Special Missions. The lab displays how many Tokens are required for the next upgrade. Tap each upgrade to learn its benefits. SPECIAL AGENTS Agents can be purchased with Monkey Money and once purchased they will remain in your Agent deployment bar until you use them in game. Once deployed Agents will last for one game only but they provide a much needed boost on the battlefield. TOWERS Every tower has 2 upgrade paths which provide a number of powerful upgrades and abilities. This screen allows you to view the upgrades for each tower and see how much XP is required to unlock them. If you can't wait to level up you can access a tower's upgrades immediately for a small fee. Every tower has 2 upgrade paths which provide a number of powerful upgrades and abilities. This screen allows you to view the upgrades for each tower and see how much XP is required to unlock them. SPECIALTY BUILDINGS Purchase land to gain access to cool Specialty Buildings which improve each attack tower. You can only have one building active at a time, but each building grants 3 main upgrades and an extra special 4th tier upgrade. DEPLOYMENT BAR This is the Agents and Abilities deployment bar. From here you can drag Agents onto the battlefield just like regular towers.\n\nAbilities are slightly different. Once you unlock an ability it will be added to the deployment bar and you simply tap the icon to activate it. The ability will then go on a cooldown timer and you won't be able to activate it again until the timer resets.

CONGRATULATIONS! You earned an\nachievement:
UNLOCK SANDBOX? This will unlock sandbox mode for all Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced and Expert maps.\nSandbox mode lets you test out towers, tactics and anything else you like in an open and fun environment.
UNLOCK FAST TRACK? Permanently unlock the Fast Track play mode, where you fast track past the first 25 rounds. Start at round 26 with $5000 cash to get up into those high rounds faster.
UNLOCK REVERSE MODE? Permanently unlock the Reverse play mode, where Bloons will travel in the opposite direction from normal.

Please try again later ODYSSEY Welcome adventurer, it's time to begin your Odyssey! Start out by selecting a difficulty. Choose wisely though, harder paths have more tracks to beat, however they also contain greater rewards if you complete the Odyssey. Lastly beware, you only have one set of lives and if you run out during the adventure then you'll have to go all the way back to the start. Good Luck! Reset Odyssey? Armed with sharp acorns, this special agent goes berserk when bloons leak. For a few seconds, he attacks super fast, can spot camo, and pop lead. Pro Upgrade - Anger Mismanagement! Despite counselling the squirrel agent is even angrier. He gets so worked up that every 50 acorns he goes berserk even if bloons haven't leaked, attacking super fast, spotting camo, and popping lead. Grows bananas that you can tap to collect for cash. Tired of picking up all those bananas yourself? So is this guy but at least he's paid to do it. Farmer will auto-gather all bananas in his radius so you don't have to. Pro Upgrade - Banana Cannon! Farmer collect bananas from nearby Farms, then shoots the skins onto the track, making bloons slide back toward the entrance. This agent has a hive of angry bees that zip to their targets and sting bloons until all layers are popped. Stingers can't pop lead or ice but regrower Bloons beware. Pro Upgrade - Swarm! The Swarm Activated Ability launches 100 bees that will seek targets and pop them mercilessly for a short duration. Can't pop lead or ice but regrower bloons beware! Plant this fast-growing bloon killer right on the track. Loses a thorn for each bloon popped, but grows 10 thorns between each round (up to 200). Pro Upgrade - Creepers! Creepers appear every 3 rounds and can grow up to 15 thorns each. Protect them as Creepers are destroyed if stripped of thorns. Main bush still grows 10 thorns per round up to 200. Rapidly sucks up and shreds bloons, spitting what's left out the back. The Bloonsday Device gives you temporary control of the orbital strike satellite, whose beam destroys all bloons and does big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Pro Upgrade - Plasmatic Fusion! Focal doubling at the point of impact leaves a trail of plasma along the strike path, so hot it will continue to damage all bloons and MOAB-classes until spent or dissipated. Shoots a single bomb that explodes in a radius burst. Can pop lead bloons. Throws a single boomerang in an arc, can pop 3 bloons. Shoots darts like a machine gun, at any position you tap. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Placed directly on the track, these explode after 3 seconds. Shoots a glob of monkey glue that slows a single bloon. Powerful attack helicopter armed with twin dart shooters and multiple patrol options. Temporarily freezes nearby bloons. Frozen bloons are immune to sharp objects. Meerkat Spy has no attack, but instead uses his super keen senses to spot Camo Bloons, granting Camo Detection for all towers within his radius. Pro Upgrade - Cyber Eye! No longer weaponless, the Meerkat Pro can now blast any single bloon into dust and help put the hurt on MOAB-class bloons. Grants camo detection to all towers in his radius. Patrols the skies above the action, blasting the area with 8 powerful darts. Throws magic bolts that can pop 2 bloons each. Shoots a single, heavy dart that can pop up to 5 bloons each. Water only. Uses a powerful nail gun, and builds traps, sentries, and enhancers. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Water based tower that shoots homing darts. Can upgrade to shoot at Bloons in the radius of any other tower. Can also upgrade to submerge and become a support tower. Reduces cost of all towers and upgrades in radius by 10%. Launches explosive mortar shells to a single targeted spot. Throws sharp shurikens rapidly and can see camo bloons. Place almost any land tower on water with the Pontoon! Deploy the pontoon on water, then place your land tower on top. Pro Upgrade - Primo Pontoon! In addition to luxury fittings, the Primo Pontoon has an uplink to Monkey Town HQ, granting any attached tower a range bonus. Place on water then place your land tower on top. Nowhere to float your boat? Smart monkeys know they can place a Portable Lake on land, allowing any water unit to be deployed within its waters. Pro Upgrade - Sea Monster! New Activated Ability temporarily awakens the Sea Monster, which bashes nearby bloons, popping 5 layers and sometimes stunning them. Any water unit can be placed in the Lake. These slick prehistoric predators orbit their nest and pop any regular bloons they hit, but they can only pop so many before a new one has to hatch. Pro Upgrade - Radderdactyls! Bigger wing blow back bloons with each flap, and they can pop far more regular bloons before going back to the nest. Placed directly on the track, each pack of spikes can pop 10 bloons. Pops 2 layers off of bloons, with unlimited range. Each round generates piles of road spikes that can pop 5 bloons each. Throws darts bloon-meltingly fast. It's a bird. It's a plane. It's a squadron of flying super-powered laser-beamin' monkeys who destroy every single bloon on screen and do big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Pro Upgrade - Double Storm! A second pass of Super Monkeys follows the first after a short delay, destroying every bloon on screen and damaging MOAB-classes. Shoots 8 tacks spread in all directions, each tack can pop 1 bloon. Tribal Turtle can live on land or water. Throws spears and coconuts, coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons. Pro Upgrade - Ambidexterity! Elite training allows the Turtle Pro to throw spear and coconut simultaneously for maximum bloon hurt. Coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons.

Grows 3 big bunches of bananas. Grows 7 big bunches each round. Generates 13 big bunches of bananas every round. Produces 5 boxes of bananas every round. Bananas last 25 seconds instead of the usual 15. Each bunch or box of bananas is worth 50% more cash. Generates stored cash that earns 10% each round and holds up to $5000. 20% interest each round instead of 10% and storage for $20,000.
Increased suction sucks bloons in faster. Higher wattage motor allows for sucking in heavier bloons such as lead bloons. Dual layer blade array doubly shreds bloons, taking off 2 layers instead of 1. Wide funnel can suck in MOAB class bloons, which will be shredded for up to 3 seconds before being ejected. Increases suction range More efficient internal componentry decreases the time bloons take to be shredded. Triple barrels provide the most effecient bloon shredding possible. Huge burst of suction power brings all nearby non-MOAB class bloons towards it and holds them there until they are sucked into the tower. Lasts 8 seconds.
Gives tower longer attack range. Each explosion throws out 8 sharp fragments for more popping. Throws out secondary bombs instead of frags. Bloons become stunned for a short time when they are hit. Larger blast area and more popping power. More velocity and range, more damage, and faster firing. Inflicts x10 damage on MOAB class bloons. Ability: deadly missile seeks the nearest MOAB and destroys it.
Boomerangs can now pop 7 bloons each. Throws sharper, faster, bigger glaives instead of boomerangs. Glaives now automatically bounce from bloon to bloon. Two permanent glaives orbit the tower. Sonic boomerangs can smash through frozen bloons. Red hot boomerangs can melt through lead bloons. Throws boomerangs twice as fast. Ability: attacks incredibly fast for 10 seconds.
Greatly reduces the spread of the gun. Makes gun fire much faster. Rapid fire plasma can pop 13 bloons each and also pops frozen bloons. The Ray of Doom is a persistent solid beam of bloon destruction. Darts move faster and can pop 3 bloons each. Shots can now hurt any bloon type. Shoots vicious little missiles instead of darts. Ability: shoots missiles toward the nearest 100 bloons on screen.
Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal. Shoots even further and can detect camo. Catapult fires spiked balls that can pop 18 bloons. Hurls a giant spiked ball that excels at crushing ceramics. Can pop 1 extra bloon per shot. Can pop 2 extra bloons per shot. Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1. Ability: up to 10 nearby dart monkeys go Super for 10 seconds.
Glue soaks through all layers of bloon. Glued bloons pop one layer every few seconds. Extreme solvents melt two layers every second. Pops once instantly and liquifies bloons ten times every second! Makes glue effect last much longer. Splatters glue across 6 bloons at a time. Shoots glue more than 3x as fast! Ability: glues everything on the screen temporarily.
Shoots 4 darts per volley instead of 2. Superior targeting computers enable a new targeting option to pursue bloons. Rotor blades rip up bloons on contact, including frozen and lead. Adds a large missile array and a powerful machine gun. More powerful jets enable the Heli to move much faster. Allows Heli Pilot to detect and shoot Camo bloons. Blows bloons away from the Heli. Abilities: drops med and cash crates, or can pick up and reposition most towers.
Larger freeze area that freezes bloons for longer. Pops a layer off of each bloon frozen. Super cold aura that slows all bloons in its larger radius. Frozen bloons freeze other bloons that come in contact. Bloons move slowly even after thawing out. Freezes 2 layers, extending the slow duration. Razor sharp shards fly out when frozen bloons pop. Ability: freezes all bloons on screen temporarily.
Shoots darts more often. Monkey Ace darts can pop 8 bloons each! Darts seek out and pop bloons intelligently. Flying fortress of bloon doom. Drops an exploding pineapple every 3 seconds. Allows the Monkey Ace to hit camo bloons. More darts = win. Ability: drops a devastating bomb that destroys all bloons and damages MOAB class.
Shoots larger and more powerful magical bolts. Unleash the power of lightning to zap many bloons at once. Whirlwind blows bloons off the path away from the exit. Pops bloons and blows them faster, further and more often. The Apprentice adds a powerful fireball attack to its arsenal. Allows the Monkey Apprentice to hit camo bloons. Spews endless flames at nearby bloons. Ability: super powerful phoenix wreaks bloon havoc for 20 seconds.
Shoots its big darts faster. Much longer range. Attacks super duper fast! Launches fast strafing Monkey Ace pilots. Adds a spray of 4 sharp grapes. Allows the Buccaneer to hit camo bloons. Adds a powerful, independently firing cannon to the Buccaneer. Ability: grapples the nearest MOAB and brings it down.
Creates temporary sentry guns and deploys them nearby. Increases build speed produces sentry guns more often. Sprays foam that removes camo and regen, and pops leads. Trap captures bloons until full; can be emptied for cash. Massive nails pop 8 bloons at once, including frozen bloons Shoot further and deploy sentries in a larger area. Increases sentry fire rate appreciably. Ability: target tower becomes super powered for 60 seconds.
Makes the Submarine's darts pop up to 3 bloons each. Allows long range targeting of bloons that are in the radius of your other towers. Activate submerge using target option to permanently reveal camo bloons in its radius. Activate submerge using target option to detect camo, pop bloons, and reduce water tower cooldowns by 15% (doesn't stack). Added twin gun doubles attack speed. Airburst darts split into 3 on impact for massively increased popping power. Ballistic missile seeks its target over any distance and does extra damage to Ceramic and MOAB class bloons. Ability: a devastating missile strike on the largest bloon on screen. Destroys up to a ZOMG bloon in one go, or many lesser bloons.
Increases attack range by 15% of all towers in its radius. Jungle drums inspire nearby towers to attack 15% faster. Bloons popped near the Monkey Town get 50% more cash per pop. Nearby ability cooldowns reduced by 20%. Increases the popping power of all nearby towers by 1. Allows all towers within its radius to hit camo bloons. Allows all nearby towers to pop all bloon types. Ability: increases attack speed, pierce, and range for towers in radius for 10 seconds
Makes your mortar shots more accurate. Heavy ordinance delivers a bigger explosion radius. Smash through 2 layers of bloons at once! Devastating explosions each pop 3 layers of bloon. Increase the attack speed of the Mortar. Pops additional bloons 2 seconds after impact. Camo Bloons popped by flares permanently lose their camo. Ability: immobilizes and bombards the entire screen for 5 seconds.
Increases attack range and attack speed. Shurikens can pop 4 bloons each. Throws 2 shurikens at once. Throws 5 shurikens at once! Shuriken will seek out and pop bloons automatically. Some bloons become distracted and move the wrong way. Sometimes throws a flash bomb that stuns multiple bloons. Ability: Lasts for 15 seconds. During the sabotage, all new bloons are crippled to half speed.
Shots can pop through 4 layers of bloon. Can pop lead and frozen. Shots can pop through 7 layers of bloon! Erases 18 layers of bloon per shot - enough to destroy a ceramic. Immobilizes MOAB class bloons for a short time. Allows Sniper to shoot faster. Allows Sniper to detect and shoot Camo bloons. Allows Sniper to take multiple shots and attack 3x as fast. Ability: drops a crate full of cash.
Generates larger piles of Spikes per shot. Cuts through lead like a hot spike through... lead. Produces sharp spiked balls that do extra damage to ceramics. Spiked balls explode when they lose all their spikes. Increases the rate of Spike production. Rate of spike production increases even more. Super-Hard-Rending-Engine-Driven-Razors shred MOAB class bloons. Ability: Lays down a thick carpet of Spikes over the whole track.
Fast firing twin laser beams pop twice as much as before. Plasma vaporizes everything it touches. It is said that bloons dare not touch the sun. Tower sacrifices enhance and modify the Temple's awesome arsenal. Super Monkey with super range = good! Why settle for super when you can have EPIC? Half Super Monkey, half killer robot of death. Ability: destroys all bloons within short radius of tower - completely and utterly.
Shoots tacks faster. Shoots tacks even faster! Sprays out 16 tacks per volley instead of the usual 8. Shoots a deadly ring of flame instead of tacks. Tacks fly out further than normal. Tacks go much further than normal. Shoots out big razor sharp blades. Ability: covers the area in a storm of blades.

On Easy towers cost less than normal, the Bloons move a little slower and you have 200 lives. Beating round 50 in Easy awards you a bronze medal for that track. On Medium your towers cost the normal amount and you have 150 lives. Beating round 65 in Medium difficulty awards you a silver medal for that track. On Hard your towers cost more than normal, the Bloons move faster and you have 100 lives only. Beating round 85 in hard difficulty awards you a gold medal for that track. On Impoppable towers cost more than hard. The Bloons move faster, are stronger than ever and you can't lose a single life. Beating round 85 awards you the impoppable medal. Once you start, you cannot stop. Bloons will keep coming until you lose. How far can you get? Start with $50,000. No more money is earned during play. You start at round 30 and banana farms and other cash generating abilities are disabled. How far can you get? Sandbox mode lets you test out towers, tactics and anything else you like in an open and fun environment.
Easy peasy. Have fun unlocking all of the new tower upgrades and discovering what they do. Besides having more layers, the different colored bloons also move faster. Keep playing Bloons TD 5 regularly and check for new updates - tracks, towers, missions and other awesomeness. First Green Bloons are coming next round. The more you use a certain tower, the more upgrades you will unlock for it. Each tower has 2 upgrade paths, but you can only get extra special 3rd and 4th upgrades on one of the paths. The bloons will now get trickier, coming in tight bunches to break through or relying on sheer numbers. Coming up next are some Blue Bloons, then some more, then some more, then some more. Good old Yellow Bloons. Quite fast, quite big, and quite dangerous. Have you got your exits covered? If you have not played more Ninja Kiwi games, you should - because those games are fun, and fun is good. Once you unlock a new tower, it will be unlocked permanently. Use more towers of a certain kind to unlock its upgrades faster. Have some free money with 80 greens coming up next. White bloons incoming. Immune to freezination. That was just one Camo Bloon. Try road spikes if your towers missed it. There will be more soon so prepare! Leads are slow and easily dealt with if you have the right towers but sharp things just don't scratch 'em. Next round there are lots of Camo Bloons - consider the way of the Ninja Monkey. Rainbow bloons, pretty fast, pretty mean and pretty pretty. They're rainbows after all, right? Beware round 42... More Camo Bloons. Very soon. You have been warned. Next round separates the strong from the weak. Camo detection and fast damage for Regrowers. Building up a bit of nest egg are we? Think carefully about what to spend it on - money for pops gets tighter. Got any Super Monkeys yet? Ok, let's ramp things up a bit shall we? Somewhere, over the Rainbows... Camo + Lead inbound. Enjoy that BFB did you? Next level will be hard. Really hard. Last level for Medium difficulty coming up. Keep playing, keep learning. There's a token for you past round 100, too. I pop, therefore I am. Congrats on getting this far. Ready for a whole bunch of Ceramics to charge right through your defenses? You can keep going, but remember to take time to do non-BTD5 things. Like eat and go outside. Regen AND Camo coming up. Not very fun or fair really, is it? If you are playing on Hard, you've done well to get this far. Of course it will all end next level. Next up is the final round, beat it and you'll gain the Impoppable medal. You won't though, this has been a waste of time and you won't survive what's coming. At least you had fun. Freeplay, freeplay, freeplay. Have fun! Congrats passing that last round. You earned yourself a token.
Black & White Bloons Lead Bloons Camo Bloons Regrow Bloons Ceramic Bloons Boss Bloons ZOMG Bloons Special Agents Activated Ability Banana Farm Heli Pilot Free Play Towers Towers Submerge Mystery Parcel Impoppable Odyssey Auto Round Start
Black Bloons and White Bloons are small but contain two Pinks. Black Bloons are immune to explosions and White Bloons are immune to freezing. Zebra Bloons are immune to both! Lead Bloons move slowly, but are immune to anything sharp. They contain two Black Bloons. Camo Bloons are very dangerous since most Towers cannot hit them. Any Bloon type can be Camo, and so will all the Bloons that come out of that one. They can only be hit by Towers that can detect Camo Bloons, such as the Ninja Monkey. In an emergency, use Road Spikes to pop them. The Bloons have a powerful new advancement: regrowth. Heart-shaped in appearance, they will grow layers back to their original size if not popped quickly. Beware! Ceramic Bloons are made of clay, and take 10 hits to destroy. They have 2 Rainbow Bloons inside them. MOAB-class Bloons (MOABs, BFBs, and ZOMGs) require hundreds of hits to pop. Luckily for you, they tend to move quite slowly. If any of these get through, it's game over. This is the ZOMG. The Zeppelin Of Mighty Gargantuaness. Popping this is very, very, difficult. You have a Special Agent. These are once-use items that can help you win. Some items are towers that are placed, others are special powers that are activated. You can see how many of each Special Agent you own by tapping the Special Powers Star button. You have a Special Agent. These are once-use items that can help you win. Some items are towers that are placed, others are special powers that are activated. You can see how many of each Special Agent you own in the deployment bar at the bottom of the screen. One of your towers now has an Activated Ability. These are extremely powerful abilities that can be used when you get in trouble. Each ability is on a 'cool-down' before it can be used again. You can use the ability by tapping the Special Powers Star button and then tapping the ability icon. One of your towers now has an Activated Ability. These are extremely powerful abilities that can be used when you get in trouble. Each ability is on a 'cool-down' before it can be used again. You can use the ability by tapping the ability icons above the deployment bar. You have a Banana Farm! These farms generate bananas automatically each round. Convert the bananas into cash by tapping the bananas. Don't wait too long - the bananas will spoil after 10 seconds if not collected. You have a Heli Pilot! This powerful attack copter has multiple patrol options. Choose between Follow Touch, Lock'n'Place and Patrol, where it will attack between two set points. This is free play mode. You get XP more slowly, but you can earn a Token and get on Leaderboards. Some rounds start to get pretty heavy later on, so your device will start to lag eventually - good luck! Buy towers here and place them around the track to pop the incoming Bloons. Popping Bloons gives you cash to buy more towers or upgrade your existing ones. The Engineer has been added to your tower loadout! This tower wields a powerful nail gun and has many useful upgrades that create traps, sentries and other enhancements. Your Monkey Sub can now submerge and provide support abilities for your other towers. Activate submerge mode by cycling through the targeting options. Congratulations, you've popped enough Bloons to unwrap the mysterious parcel. Tap on the present to uncover the gift inside! Remember you're in odyssey mode, your lives need to last you multiple tracks! Good luck! Auto round start is now on. When on, there are no pauses between rounds and the next wave of Bloons will appear automatically. This option can be disabled via the settings menu.
Apprentices with Monkey Sense upgrades can pop camos Dartling Guns and Spike Factories pop camos even without upgrades Camo-lead bloons are vicious! Try Cannon Ship Buccaneers or Flash Bomb Ninjas Round 59 has tricky camo-leads. Try Monkey Sense Apprentices or White Hot Spike Factories Camo-lead bloons are vicious! Add a Meerkat or Radar Scanner Village to Bomb Towers Slow Ceramic bloons with Ice or Glue so other towers strip their layers The first MOAB appears on round 46 and takes hundreds of hits to pop. Be ready! Pop Regen bloons fast to stop them regrowing or duplicating! MOAB Mauler Bomb Towers do big damage to MOAB-class bloons Even MOAB-class bloons are vulnerable to the high fire rate of a Super Monkey Banana Farm cash can be essential to winning harder difficulties Using special agents enough times will permanently unlock the powerful Pro version Use Monkey Lab Tokens to give small permanent upgrades to starting cash, attack speed, and others Specialty Buildings give their towers lowered price, faster attacks, and awesome unique powers Tap on info buttons throughout the game to bring up descriptions and explanations Having trouble placing towers exactly where you want? Try “Drop & Lock” in Tools or Pause Tap on the daily reward chest every day to earn more and more free Monkey Money Try changing some of your towers' attack settings from “First” to “Strong.” Place towers at track intersections and corners for maximum popping

4 of a Kind Complete all daily challenges in one day. Completed all daily challenges in one day.
Perfect Week Complete all daily challenges in a week. Completed all daily challenges in a week.
Centurion Complete 100 daily challenges. Completed 100 daily challenges.
Monkey Lane, Easy Win using only Dart, Sniper, Ninja, and Bomb Towers.
Bloon Circles, Easy Win using only Tack, Boomerang, Apprentice, and Glue Towers. $800 starting cash.
Park Path, Easy Win using only Buccaneer, Monkey Ace, Ice, and Dartling Towers. $1000 starting cash.
Mount Magma, Easy Win using only Boomerang, Super Monkey, Monkey Village, and Mortar Towers
Archipelago, Deflation Survive through wave 65 using only Buccaneer, Bomb, Apprentice, and Glue Towers
Switch, Easy Win using only Boomerang, Ninja, Bomb, and Monkey Ace Towers. $800 starting cash.
Monkey Lane, Apopalypse Survive through wave 65 using only Sniper, Ninja, Apprentice, and Dartling Towers. $800 starting cash.
Park Path, Medium Win using only Tack, Sniper, Banana Farm, Monkey Ace, and Mortar Towers. $800 starting cash. Watch those camos!
Ice and Fire Win using only Ice, Apprentice, Bomb, and Mortar Towers, plus Pineapples for good measure.
Castle, Easy Win using only Dart, Boomerang, Buccaneer, and Apprentice Towers
Bloon Circles, Deflation Survive through wave 65 using only Dart, Ninja, Bomb, and Mortar Towers
Pass 10 Epic Rounds With Lots o' Cash Start on round 85 and pass round 95 with $200,000. All Towers, instant epic.
Archipelago, Medium Win using only Dart, Apprentice, Buccaneer, and Monkey Village Towers
Super Clock Win using only Dart Monkeys, Super Monkeys, and Monkey Village Towers, plus Pineapples.
Where'd My Towers Go? Pass rounds 10 to 45 using only road spikes, pineapples and banana farms!
Strapped for Cash Pass 50 rounds with zero starting cash. Use special agents to help you through the early rounds, but don't spend too much monkey money!
Harrison's Challenge Player designed challenge - beat Monkey Lane on Hard using Tack, Bomb, Apprentice, and Dartling Towers. Camo Leads could be tricky.
Switch it Up Beat the Switch using only Dart, Apprentice, Ice, and Super Monkey Towers.
Davy Jones Locker The fleet has been sunk! Survive 65 rounds on the high seas with no Monkey Buccaneers.
Ice, Wind, & Fire The elemental powers shall rule this day. Can they survive 85 relentless rounds? $1000 cash to start.
Dart Monkeys a plenty Pass the first 40 rounds using only Dart Monkeys! No Special Agents allowed, but Pineapples and Roadspikes are fair game.
Classic BTD Dart Monkeys, Tack Towers, Bomb Towers, Ice Towers and Super Monkeys only. Just like in BTD1. Pass 50 rounds on Easy on The Rink track. No Special Agents allowed.
Long Siege Start at round 10 and pass round 100. All towers available, and you start with $3000 and 400 lives.
Air and Sea Using only Buccaneers and Monkey Aces, pass 50 rounds on the tricky Castle Track set to Easy Difficulty. Start with $850
Apopalypse Now Can the Soldier Monkeys prevent the Apopalypse? Dartling, Mortar, and Sniper Monkeys must survive through round 40, with Banana Farm and Pineapple support. $4000 to start.
Crop Dusting DDT did a job on me! Can Aces and Glue Gunners do a job on on 65 rounds of Bloons? Dust 'em! Farms, Pineapples, and $2000 to start. Plan for those camo leads.
Two of a Kind Pairs for the win! All towers available, but you must beat 85 rounds with no more than 2 of any tower and agent type.
Time's Up Cheat time for 50 rounds using only Boomerang, Bomb, Monkey Ace, and Dartling Towers. $1000 starting cash.
Sniper Alley Can Snipers win the war against 50 rounds of bloons when you only have 1 life? $1000 to start, Farms and Pineapples, no Agents.
Pirates and Ninjas A fearsome duo those Pirates and Ninjas - can they survive 65 rounds with only Villages, Farms, and Pineapples to support them?
A Stroll Down Monkey Lane Monkey Lane becomes a warzone! Spend your starting cash wisely and hold out till round 50. You only have 50 lives, so be careful!
Roger That Gold Leader Can you land your monkey aces on your boats? More importantly, can you survive 50 waves of bloodthirsty Bloons?
Mortar and Tack Using only Mortar Towers and level 1 Dart Monkeys, can you pass 50 rounds?
Nature Calls You are given 10 Bloonberry Bushes, a Beekeeper, and 5 Super Monkey Storms for free. All Towers disabled except Super Monkeys, who are limited. Pass round 55.
Plumb In Front Get to round 40 on the Switch track using only Dart Monkeys, Tack Towers, Boomerangs and Ice Towers. 5 Towers max at a time.
It Takes A Village Survive to Round 60 in Apopalypse mode with just the Boomerang, Bomb and Ice Towers, as well as the Monkey Village. Road Spikes and Pineapples available.
A Cool Challenge Beat The Rink on Hard with only Dart, Bomb and Village. Road spikes are allowed but Special Agents are not.
One Ring to Rule Them All Beat Mount Magma - Medium using only 1 of any given tower. No Monkey Village, Road Spikes or Pineapples.
Heart of the Maelstrom Shred your way through 20 levels from level 40-60 using only Tack Towers. A free Meerkat is added to help you with the Camo rounds.
Martial Arts Masters Pass Switch on Medium with Boomerangs and Ninjas. Pineapples and Roadspikes allowed.
Low Tek Pass The Rink on Easy. But your towers cannot be upgraded and Road Spikes and Pineapples are disabled. Not so easy now is it?
Deflate the Clock Start on round 30 and pass round 50 in Deflation mode.
Classic Beat Park Path on Easy using only Dart Monkeys, Tack Shooters, Ice Towers, Bomb Towers and Road Spikes. The catch: only (1,1) upgrades are allowed.
Bombs, Glue, Village Pass Easy Castle Track using only Bomb Towers, Glue Gunners and Villages. Little bit extra starting cash. Spikes and Pineapples ok.
ZOMG Pass level 85, medium, Monkey Lane. $40,000
One Rink to Rule Them All Beat The Rink on Medium using only 1 of any given tower. As before, no Villages, no Road Spikes or Pineapples.
Ninja Glue on the Farm Ninjas, Glue and Banana Farms only, defeat Park Path on Medium.
Storm at Sea Use Buccaneers and Apprentices to beat Archipelago on Medium, rounds 35 thru 65.
Switch It Up Beat Switch on Medium using partially upgradeable Dart, Tack and Bomb towers with access to full Mortar towers. You receive a bonus Meerkat and Bloonberry Bush.
Icebreaker Beat The Rink on Easy using Buccaneers, Bombs and Boomerang Throwers.
Banned: Camo Detection Can you survive 36 rounds without Camo Detection?
Super Glue Vacation Beat first 65 rounds of Hard on Switch without using Super Monkeys or Glue Gunners.
Building the Ark Use up to two each of Ninjas, Dart Monkeys, Buccaneers, Snipers and Apprentices to clear Park Path on Medium.
Mount Boom Mount Magma on Medium using Boomerang, Monkey Ace and Dartling gunners. Partial Banana Farm upgrades. Beekeeper and 2 Angry Squirrels to get you started.
Time Goes On Beat the Clock on Medium using ice towers, sniper monkey (4-2), tack towers, boomerang throwers and bomb towers. This challenge from Umbr30nth3gr3at!
Yin Test your knowledge of the unseen path. Defeat 85 rounds on the Rink using only the first path of your abilities.
Yang This time you will face 85 rounds on Park Path, and you must test only the second path of your abilities.
Deflated Beat rounds 30 to 60 on Mount Magma in Deflation using 4 towers at most and without Villages or Supermonkeys.
Apopalypse Now Beat Apopalypse Monkey Lane round 40 using un-upgraded dart monkeys, bomb towers, ice towers, tack towers, ninjas and spike factories.
B Day Yes, Bloonsday has come to the Monkey Lane.
The Big Bang Beat hard on Park Path with Bomb Towers, Mortar Towers, Monkey Aces, Monkey Buccaneers (4-2) and Pineapples.
Ice, Ice Baby Beat Bloon Circles on Easy using Sniper Monkeys and Ice Towers.
Ride the Lightning Reach round 85 on the Rink Easy using Monkey Apprentice (4,2), Banana Farms and Monkey Villages.
Firestorm Defeat Archipelago on Hard using Wizards, Farms, Villages, Spikes, Pineapples. One Tribal Turtle provided.
Mortar in the Mount Use Mortar towers only to pass rounds 10 to 60 Mount Magma on easy. $2000 starting cash. Road Spikes allowed.
Hard? That was Easy Reach Round 45 Apopalypse on Castle using Spike Factories, Boomerang, Bomb Tower, Glue Gunners and Buccaneers. You start with 8000 cash.
Look Left Beat Park Path on Medium difficuly using only the left towers! No Special Agents.
Look Right Beat Bloon Circles on Easy difficulty using only the right towers! No Special Agents.
Cross the Road Beat Monkey Lane on Hard difficulty using a criss-cross selection of towers! No Special Agents.
Tacktics Get to level 60 on Park Medium difficulty using only Tack Tower (3,2), Spike Factory (2,2) and Road Spikes. Special Agents allowed.
Icebreaker Rink on Medium difficulty using only Sniper Monkeys and Buccaneers. Pass round 65 to win! Special Agents allowed. No Road Spikes or Pineapples.
Green Eyed Monsters Archipelago with only Super Monkeys limited to 0-2 range upgrades. 3400 cash, 8 Tribal Turtles and a single Meerkat Spy should help with the tricky rounds. Pass round 50 on Easy.
That Was Quick Pass the infamous Hard difficulty ceramic bloon destruction round with just 25,000 cash and no Special Agents.
Slowed and Steady Bloon Circles with only Sniper Monkeys and Glue Gunners.No Special Agents. Pass round 46 on Easy.
Monkey Strike Beat Medium Switch without using Monkey Towers. Two Tribal Turtles and a Beekeeper will help out.
The Power of Three... Types of Towers. Pass Mount Magma using only Apprentices, Boomerang Throwers and Ninja Monkeys. Medium Difficulty.
A Walk in the Park Beat Hard difficulty with only Dart Monkeys. A Tribal Turtle is provided if you can't handle it.
Bull's-Eye Using only Dartling Guns, pass Clock on Medium difficulty. 950 cash to start you off.
Upon the Boiling Seas With only Buccaneers, pass Archipelago on Medium. No Special Agents.
The Three Ninjas How long can you survive with just three Ninja Monkeys on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 levels to win!
The Whirling Trio How long can you survive with just three Boomerang Throwers on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 levels to win!
The Color of Magic How long can you survive with just three Apprentices on Monkey Lane Easy? Pass 48 rounds to win!
Bombs, Ice and Fire Using Bomb Towers, Ice Towers and Tack Towers (4,2), beat The Rink Medium difficulty. One Meerkat for camouflage detection.
Monkey River With nothing but monkeys, beat Snake River Medium difficulty starting from round 46 with 18,000 cash.
Nine by Three Maximum of 9 towers. No more than 3 of each. Beat Bloon Circles on Medium. No Special Agents, Road Spikes, Pineapples, Banana Farms or supply drop Snipers.
Darts Galore Using only towers that shoot, throw or otherwise propel darts, pass Archipelago on Hard difficulty. No Special Agents.
Enhanced Bombardment Bombard your way through Monkey Lane on Easy using Bomb Towers, Mortar Towers and Exploding Pineapples. No Special Agents.
Mechanically Inclined With Boomerang Throwers (2,4) and Super Monkeys (2,4) pass Switch on Medium. One Meerkat Provided.
Budget Cuts Pass Castle Medium with no Banana Farms, Road Spikes or Pineapples and upgrades limited to 2,2.
Don't Pollute the River! Beat Snake River Medium Difficulty with only Spike Factories. 900 cash to start with.
A Small Selection With a few non-upgradeable towers pass Monkey Lane on Easy. No Special Agents.
Bloonstopping Beat Switch Medium Difficulty using only 2,4 Ninja Monkeys, 4,2 Bomb Towers, 2,4 Glue Gunners and Ice Towers. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Fight Fire with Fire Beat Mount Magma on Hard with fire and explosives.
Boomer-Vanced Aircraft Monkey Lane Medium with Boomerang Throwers and Monkey Aces (4th upgrades disabled). 100 Lives. No Special Agents.
You Stay On Your Side Left side can only use left upgrades. Right side can only use right upgrades. Pass Bloon Circles on Hard from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
We Need to Go Faster Some towers can upgrade their attack speed. With those towers and the paths with speed upgrades beat Park on Easy.
Bad Aim Beat Monkey Lane Easy with Dartling Guns (0,3) and Monkey Aces(2,3). Start with 810 cash and 50 lives.
BBBB Snake River Medium with Boomerang Throwers, Bomb Towers, Buccaneers and Banana Farms. Only Special Agents starting with "B"
Wait, What? Can you get what's necessary before it's too late? Rink Hard difficulty. Finish after you beat round 50.
Excuse Me, This Is Our Side Left side can only use right upgrades. Right side can only use left upgrades. Pass Snake River on Hard from round 30 with 8,000 cash. 'Cause Eros asked for it.
Eight's Unlucky 7 towers or fewer on Clock Hard. No Road Spikes or Pineapples. Start from round 13 with 3,333 cash.
Special Assets Pass Castle Medium, rounds 30-85 starting with 8,000 cash. Tack Towers, Snipers, Bombs, Buccaneers(4,2), Aces, Mortars and Dartlings. 50 lives. No Special Agents.
You've Got On The Hat Some monkeys wear hats. With those monkeys only, beat Monkey Lane Easy.
Maul Those MOABs! With Bomb Towers (2,3), Super Monkeys (2,3) and Spike Factories (2,3) beat The Rink medium starting with 14,000 cash on round 46. One Meerkat provided.
One at a Time, Please With only attacking towers that hit one bloon per projectile, beat Monkey Lane easy. Upgrades that break that rule are disabled.
An Unlikely Trio With a Buccaneer, Ice Tower and Spike Factory beat Park medium difficulty.
The Glue, the BADS and the Factory Using a Glue Gunner, a Dartling Gun (2,4) and a Spike Factory beat Snake River on Medium. Start on round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Tribal Warfare Using primitive Boomerang throwers (2,2) and Banana Farms (2,2) beat Bloon Circles on Medium. Two Tribal Turtles, and two Meerkats have come to your aid.
Bionic Artillery With no more than three of each, use Boomerang Throwers (2,4) and Mortar Towers to beat Monkey Lane easy from round 30. Start with 3000 cash.
Dart Shortage A guerrilla bloon strike has created a dart shortage at the front. Without dart wielding towers beat The Rink on easy from round 10.
Liquid Hot Magma Using only Tack Towers and Spike Factories beat Mount Magma easy from round 20 with 4,000 cash.
Specialization Start at round 20 with 4,000 cash. Only Tack Towers (3,4), Glue Gunners (4,3), Buccaneers (3,2), Banana Farms and Road Spikes. One SMS for round 59.
Fire, Water, Glue With Tack Towers, Bomb Towers and Glue Gunners beat Archipelago on Medium from round 40 with 9,000 cash. One Meerkat provided.
Red, White and Blue With Ninja Monkeys, Ice Towers and Super Monkeys beat Monkey Lane rounds 40 - 65 on hard with 10,000 cash. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Almost a Zoo Beat Park Path on easy with a Super Monkey, Meerkat, Beekeeper, Angry Squirrel and Tribal Turtle. Start at round 25 with 1,200 cash and 100 lives. Beat round 42 to win.
Ride the Lightning: Part Deux With Apprentices (2,2) and Banana Farms beat Lightning Scar on medium. Start on round 20 with 3,200 cash.
Pool Party Monkey Lane medium with Buccaneers only. Start at round 45 with 10,000 cash. Two Paddling Pools provided.
The No Aim Game Using one Tack Tower, Ice Tower, Monkey Ace (2,4), Village (3,4), Banana Farm and Spike Factory beat Park Path on hard rounds 30 - 60 with 6,200 cash.
Icy Valkyries With 1,2 upgrades beat rounds 30-45 on The Rink Apopalypse. No Super Monkeys. 50 Lives, 6,000 cash.
Self-Serving Only towers capable of attacking all bloon types are allowed. Upgrade paths are limited by that. Rounds 30 - 65. 5,000 cash.
High Explosive Rounds With Sniper Monkeys and 2,2 Bomb Towers beat Lightning Scar on Easy. Start on round 35 with 8,000 cash. 100 Lives.
Widespread Malfunction Beat Switch on hard with limited technology. Super Monkeys and Boomerang Throwers 4,2, Dart Monkeys 2,4. Start on round 50 with 29,000 cash.
The Skewed RBE Monkey Lane easy. 65 Lives. All towers available. What's the catch?\n
Rebuild the Ark Pass Snake River on hard with only Boomerang Throwers, Ice Towers, Monkey Aces, Super Monkeys and Dartlings. No More than 2 of each. Start at round 35 with 6,750 cash.
I'm No Pro Bloon Circles with Monkey Aces (0,4), Ice Towers (0,0), Sniper Monkeys and Boomerang Throwers (2,2). Medium difficulty. Rounds 35 - 55 with 8,250 cash.
The Three Monkeyteers Clock, medium difficulty with three monkey towers and only one of each type. Rounds 35 - 55 with 7,250 cash.
The Switched RBE Switch medium. All towers available. 1,300 starting cash. Reds are blues, blues are reds and alternating like that all the way up.
Frozen Morterstrom With Tack Towers, Ice Towers and Mortar Towers beat Monkey Lane hard. Start at round 45 with 14,000 cash.
The Best Super-Glue in Town With one Super Monkey, Glue Gunner and Village beat Bloon Circles medium. Start at round 30 with 7,400 cash.
FIRING MA LAZAH! Mount Magma Apopalypse. Super Monkeys (1,2) Dartlings (4,2) Villages (4,2) 1 Bloonsday Device provided. Rounds 35-65 with 12,000 cash to start.
Two by Two With two of each tower at most, and only the two towers every other row of the tower selection screen, beat Snake River on Hard. Rounds 40-70 with 8,500 cash.
Two By Two: Part Two With two of each tower at most, and only the two towers every second row of the tower selection screen, beat Clock on Hard. Rounds 40-70 with 9,100 cash.
Pink and Yellow, Purple... Castle? Beat Castle rounds 30 - 55 with only towers that can be purple. Start with 15,000 cash. Lots of bloons are now pink and yellow, some are ceramic.
Two Time, Bloon Time Beat The Rink medium to round 50. No Super Monkeys or Banana Farms. Only two of each tower. All bloons are two ranks higher. 1,100 cash to start.
They Need to Sort Out Their Priorities Lightning Scar 50 - 62 on hard. Start with 17,500 cash. Only 2 of each tower without target priorities.
Precision Pineapples The only way to pop leads is with Exploding Pineapples. Otherwise beat rounds 28 - 60 on Monkey Lane hard. Start with 4,200 cash.
Defensive Line Beat Park Path on Medium from round 25. No more than five towers at once and only one of each. No Exploding Pineapples or Road Spikes. Start with 2,200 cash.
Beach-Side Picnic With Dart Monkeys, Tack Towers (2,4), Ninja Monkeys and Spike Factories beat Archipelago on medium. Three of each at most. Start at round 32 with 8,000 cash.
Four-Port Switch Beat Switch to round 60 using four of each tower. Dart Monkeys, Sniper Monkeys, Boomerang Throwers (2,4) and Mortar Towers. Start at round 32 with 7,150 cash.
Wind, Plane and Glue Pass Snake River medium to round 60 with Glue Gunners, Monkey Aces and Apprentices (4,2). Only 3 of each. Start at round 32 with 6,800 cash.
That's No Dart-agnan Beat round 50 on Switch Deflation using no more than 3 of each tower. Dart Monkeys, Glue Gunners (2,4) and Villages.
Tack Attack With Tack Towers, Spike Factories and Road Spikes beat Lightning Scar easy, rounds 40 - 60. Start with 10,500 cash.
Explosive Ordnance With 4 towers at most, and only 1 of each, beat Archipelago on medium from round 30. Only towers with explosives are available. Start with 6,500 cash.
Circles Circles With Dart Monkeys, Boomerang Throwers, Ninja Monkeys and Apprentices beat Bloon Circles on medium. Only two of each monkey. Start at round 30 with 6,500 cash.
Special! Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Support Monkeys With (2,2) Dart Monkeys to hold the bloons off, use Banana Farms to get Super Monkeys. Clock easy to round 40. Pineapples available.
Brick and Mortar With Mortar Towers, Villages and Banana Farms beat Mount Magma medium. Rounds 35 - 50 with 12,500 cash and a Tribal Turtle.
Super Bomb Factory Using Bomb Towers, Super Monkeys and Spike Factories beat Monkey Lane medium. Start at round 30 with 6,000 cash. Only 2 of each tower.
Overzealous Explosives Disposal Beat Snake River medium without towers that use explosive ammo. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
Everything You Need With Ninja Monkeys, Bomb Towers, Villages and Banana Farms beat The Rink hard. Rounds 30 - 65 with 5,000 cash.
Special!: 2 Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Chase-A-Bloon Pass Bloon Circles on Hard using Boomerang Throwers, Ninja Monkeys, Aces and Villages all limited to (4,2). Start at round 35 with 8,000 cash.
Super Monkey Squad With 6 towers Beat Snake River on hard to round 65. Start at round 25 with 18000 cash. Bloons are stronger. Super Monkeys (2,3) and Villages only.
Organic Warfare Using only fruit and towers that use fruit, beat Park Path on medium. Start at round 45 with 9,000 cash.
The Explosives Union Annoyed that explosives aren't required for lead bloons, the Explosive Union has stepped in. The only way to pop leads is with explosives. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
Playing With Fire Beat Bloon Circles on medium using Mortars, Tack Towers (4,2), Spike Factories (4,2) and Apprentices (2,4). Only two of each tower.
The Volcano That Time Forgot Beat Mount Magma on easy with (4,2) Dart Monkeys.
Third Time's a Charm Park Path easy. All towers available but only 3 of each. Bloons are 3 ranks higher. 4,700 cash to start.
Recognition With the towers and upgrades that are less used, beat Clock on medium. Start at round 25 with 3,500 cash.
Restricted War-zone With two of each Sniper Monkeys, Mortar Towers and Monkey Aces, all limited to (2,3), beat Archipelago on easy.
Crazy Eights Using towers that shoot eight shots, and with only eight towers at most, beat Monkey Lane on Medium. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash.
The Forgotten Duo Using Glue Gunners, Villages and Ice Towers beat The Rink on easy to round 45. Max towers = 9. Per tower = 4. 800 cash to start.
Special!: 3 Park Path medium rounds 30 - 60 with three towers. Only one of each available tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Diamond Dust Ice Towers, Villages (2,2) and Boomerang Throwers (1,1). Rounds 10 - 50 on Monkey Lane medium. Altered bloon levels (no MOAB class). 3,000 cash to start.
Supply Convoy With 3 Buccaneers (4,2), Sniper Monkeys (2,4), Dartlings and Bomb Towers hold off a deadly bloon force on Archipelago. Rounds 20-65. Start with 4,200 cash.
Black and White With Bomb Towers, Mortar Towers and Ice Towers beat the rink on medium. Start at round 30 with 4,000 cash.
Investment Cap Can you pass Clock medium without upgrades that cost more than the initial tower cost? Underrated1 wants to know. Start at round 25 with 4,000 cash.
Something Blue Towers with blue, bloons with blue and a track almost entirely blue. Rounds 20 - 60 with 5,000 cash to start.
The Weird RBE Beat Bloon Circles on hard with a really weird RBE. Rounds 1 - 60. Start with 3,000 cash.
Sneak Attack While on a secret mission, your forces encounter a powerful bloon battalion. With 2,4 Snipers, Aces, Ninjas and Spike Factories beat Mount Magma easy to round 65.
Anti-MOAB Squad The Anti-MOAB Squad has arrived! With 2 of each tower beat Monkey Lane medium rounds 46 - 86 with 15,000 cash to start. One Portable Lake provided.
Go Back to the Start Beat Castle medium with Boomerang Throwers (4,2), Ninjas and Apprentices (4,2). Rounds 30 - 59. Start with 13,000 cash.
The Four Monkeys of the Apopalypse Bloon Circles Apopalypse with one of each a Sniper Monkey, Ice Tower, Glue Gunner and Dartling. Rounds 1 - 40. Start with 1,000 cash.
Chemical Warfare On Snake River hard with Mortars, Glue Gunners (4,2), Aces (2,4) and Dartlings beat a lead bloon force. Four of each tower. Start on round 30 with 7,000 cash.
Stick to Your Guns Upgrades that change what a tower uses aren't allowed. Beat Park Path hard rounds 30 - 75. Start with 8,000 cash.
Short Range/Long Range With a combination of Tack Towers and Sniper Monkeys beat Bloon Circles on medium. Rounds 30 - 55 with 6,500 cash.
Caught Unawares A flanking bloon platoon has caught you unawares. Beat Monkey Lane on medium from round 15. Normal starting cash.
Extreme Farming A ZOMG is coming on round 46! You must prepare for it, or lose. 2,500 cash to start. Rounds 1 - 46.
Round and Round We Go Beat Castle easy up to round 45 with only Tack Shooters and Road Spikes. Start with 1,000 cash.
SHREDR of all Shredders With Spike Factories (2,4), Boomerang Throwers (3,2) and Tack Shooters (2,3) beat Bloon Circles medium rounds 30 - 60. Start with 8,750 cash.
Everyone's Special Using the three towers with the least bought Specialty Buildings, beat The Rink on easy. Only 50 lives.
Little Helpers Pass rounds 20-65 on Park Path medium using big machines driven by small monkeys. 3,000 cash to start.
Summer Time! Beat Dockside on medium with Buccaneers, Ice Towers, Villages and Farms. Start on round 30 with 7,000 cash. One Pontoon provided.
Mage-Gunners With Apprentices, Glue Gunners and Dartlings (2,2), beat Mount Magma medium. Start at round 35 with 8,000 cash.
Three by Three With three of each tower, fourth upgrades locked, beat The Rink on medium. 33 lives. No Super Monkeys, Villages or Farms.
20 Ceramic Bloons on the Wall Round one. Archipelago. 20 ceramic bloons. 10,000 cash.
Weathering the Storm With Super Monkeys (3,2) and Apprentices (4,2) beat Monkey Lane medium to round 60. All bloons are one rank up.
Six Selection Beat Bloon Circles with one of each a Boomerang Thrower, Bomb Tower, Ace, Apprentice, Village and Dartling.
Pass All the Rounds! Beat Switch on hard with limited tower selection. One Portable Lake provided.
Where's My Favorite Upgrade? With popular and powerful upgrades disabled beat Snake River medium up to round 50. Only 1 of each tower.
Marina Mayhem Beat Dockside with one of each a Dart Monkey, Ninja, Glue Gunner, Apprentice, Village and Spike Factory.
Another Vintage Using only towers that have been available throughout the entire BTD series, beat Monkey Lane on medium. Start at round 28 with 3,200 cash.
Frozen in Time With Bomb Towers (4,2), Ice Towers, Ninjas (2,4) and Snipers (4,2) beat Clock medium rounds 30 - 60. Only 4 of each tower. Start with 7,000 cash.
Sand Sandwich With some monkeys that enjoy sandwiches, beat Archipelago medium. No more than nine monkeys at once.
Don't Mess Up! Round 42 on Bloon Circles easy. Ice Towers, Apprentices (4,2) and Glue Gunners. 7,500 cash, 1 life.
Blistering Sands With non-living towers, beat Death Valley on Easy. 1,000 cash to start.
Near and Far Beat Snake River medium with Tack Shooters, Sniper Monkeys, Ice Towers, Mortars and Dartlings. Start at round 35 with 9,000 cash.
Import Bombs/Export Bloons Beat Dockside medium with Bomb Towers, Mortars and Dart Monkeys. Start at round 30 with 7,000 cash.
Castle Defense With Aces, Tack Shooters, Spike Factories and Buccaneers beat Castle on easy.
Watch Your Step With only tacks, beat Park Path on easy. Rounds 30 - 60. Start with 7,000 cash.
Stars On Your Head The Rink on medium with Bomb towers (4,2), Ninjas (2,3) and Apprentices (3,3)\nStart at round 30 with 5,800 cash.
Shoot the Moon! Using Dart Monkeys (2,3), Snipers, Glue Gunners, Apprentices (4,2) and Dartlings (3,3) beat Bloon Circles on medium.
Skin Protection Using towers that have suits covering their entire body, beat Snake River on medium. Start at round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Five Tiny Towers of Power With only one of each the first five towers beat Clock on easy.
No Darts. No Tacks All towers that use darts or tacks are unable to be used. Only two of each tower available. Park Path medium. 1000 cash to start.
Separation of Powers Left towers detect camo, but cannot pop lead. Right towers pop lead but cannot detect camo. Beat The Rink medium 25-65. One Super Monkey Storm provided.
Close Minded Beat Switch on Medium with towers that have no range upgrade.
Ninja Ice Bureau Beat Dockside medium with Ninja Monkeys, Ice Towers and Villages. 1000 cash to start.
Scrooge McMonkey The cheapest upgrade path is always the best option.
Fibomonkey Sequence Beat Clock rounds 13 - 55 with a specific set of towers. Start with 1,235 cash.
Bad Economy Beat Bloon Circles on hard, rounds 50 - 85. 15,000 starting cash and no Banana Farms.
The One Where Everything Explodes With a bunch of explosions, beat Lightning Scar on medium. Rounds 20 - 70 with 3,200 cash to start. Altered bloon ranks.
This Monkey's Got Deep Pockets Only the most expensive upgrade paths for you. You are visiting a Castle, after all.
A Stroll Through Death Valley Beat rounds 40 - 60 on Death Valley easy. Start with 15,000 cash.
Binary RBE 01010101010100. Rounds 25 - 65. Start with 4,000 cash.
Ol' Reliable Ninjas, Buccaneers and Apprentices are the only towers that can be upgraded past (1,1). Beat rounds 30 - 65 on Snake River. 6,400 cash to start.
The Criss-Crossed RBE Bloon Circles medium, with a slight bloon rank change. Start at round 15 with 3,000 cash.
Across the River With Boomerang Throwers, Mortars, Ice Towers and Super Monkeys beat Snake River on medium. Start at round 30 with 5,000 cash. 2 of each tower, 6 maximum.
SWAT Using towers that deal extra damage to MOAB class bloons, beat Lightning Scar rounds 46-85 on hard. Start with 18,000 cash. 1 Lake provided.
A Cold Bunch With Boomerang Throwers, Ninjas, Glue Gunners and Spike Factories beat The Rink rounds 30 - 60. Six towers max. Start with 2,500 cash.
31st Monkey Expeditionary Unit With Dart Monkeys, Snipers and Buccaneers beat Dockside on hard rounds 35 - 75. Start with 6,500 cash.
The Bloons Go One By One Clock easy rounds, 25 - 65. Aces, Mortars and Spike Factories. Four towers max. Start with 3,000 cash.
One Small Step for a Monkey Use a maximum of three towers, and no more than one of each. Beat Space Truckin' on hard rounds 30 - 50. Start with 3,000 cash.
Burning Rubber With towers that use fire and/or explosions beat Drag Strip on Easy. Start at round 20 with 3,000 cash.
John Monkeyton's Favourites! With John's favourite towers and upgrades beat Monkey Lane on Hard. Portable Lake and Beekeper Provided. Start at round 40 with 6,000 cash.
Home Sweet Home Beat Space Truckin' on hard with things that are blue and green. Rounds 30 - 70 with 4,000 cash to start.
Indistinguishable from Magic Snake River rounds 35 - 75. Boomerang, Apprentice and Super Monkey. One Tribal Turtle and Bloonsday Device provided.
Drowning Darts Beat Archipelago medium 25 - 60. Dart Monkeys, Aces and (0,3) Super Monkeys. 3 per type, 8 total. Start with 5,500 cash.
Are They as Special as They Look? Using the three towers with the most bought specialties, beat Drag Strip on easy. Rounds 20 - 60. Start with 5,000 cash.
Monkey See, Monkey Do It's Castle medium. You have to rely solely on a single Meerkat for camo detection. Start at round 24 with 4,000 cash.
Consider the Price Survive rounds 45 - 80 on Monkey Lane without upgrades that cost 5,000+ cash. Start with 15,000 cash. Village disabled.
He's a Frosty One Your towers can pop frozen bloons but not lead; you have to use Ice towers to pop lead! Beat Switch, Easy. Start at round 28 with 4,500 cash.
Lucky 7 Beat Mount Magma medium, rounds 17 - 70. 7 towers max. 77 lives and 2,777 starting cash.
Sit in the Corner With Tack Shooters, Boomerang Thrower, Ice Towers and Spike Factories beat Park Path medium. Start at round 30 with 2,700 cash. 6 Towers maximum.
Venture into Deep Space While traveling into space, the monkeys lost a lot of resources. Beat Space Truckin', Medium starting at later rounds with less cash, lives, upgrades and towers.
The Monkey is Always Right Monkeys can only use right path upgrades, non-monkeys can only use left path upgrades. Beat Bloon Circles medium from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
The Monkey isn't Always Right Monkeys can only use left path upgrades, non-monkeys can only use right path upgrades. Beat Snake River medium from round 30 with 8,000 cash.
Camo, Right? Right towers can pop camo but not lead, Left towers can pop lead but not camo. Dockside medium from round 30 with 7,000 cash. Village and Farms disabled. One SMS provided.
Tricky Bloons Aim your Mortar Towers well on this challenge. They're the only way to hit camo or lead bloons. Slalom hard rounds 28 - 65. Start with 6,000 cash. 8 towers max.
That Special Bunch Start at round 35 on Monkey Lane hard with 0 cash. Use the provided agents to hold the bloons off till you get more powerful towers. 8 towers maximum.
Stealth Mode Defeat the bloons without them knowing what hit them. (4,2) Ninjas, Snipers and (2,3) Ice Towers. Rounds 30 - 60 with 6,500 cash to start. 1 Meerkat provided.
Booming In Space Beat rounds 20 - 65 on Space Truckin' hard with Boomerang Throwers, Bomb Towers and Mortars all limited to (4,3). 7 towers max. 3 of each. Start with 2,000 cash.
Tack, Ice and a Sprinkle of Dartlings Lightning Scar medium with Tack Shooters, Ice Towers and Dartlings.
Resistance is Fruitful Black, white, zebra and ceramic bloons are pretty cool guys. They resist towers and don't afraid of anything.
Speedy Start Drag Strip easy rounds 20 - 60. Lower rank bloons are boosted. Start with 5,500 cash.
Dust Beat rounds 25 - 65 on Death Valley easy. No black, zebra or lead bloons. Limited tower selection.
The Persistence of Memory Beat Clock on medium, rounds 35 - 75, using towers that utilize or create heat. Upgrade restrictions to ensure maximum temperature.
One Must Not Falter Beat Monkey Lane easy with Dart Monkeys and Boomerang Throwers with left path upgrades only as well as Banana Farms.
Snack River Everyone likes snacks. With one of each tower beat Snake River on easy rounds 35 - 65. Start with 6,000 cash. Bloon rank altered.
That Took a While Beat Clock on medium. No fourth tier upgrades. Start with 250 cash.
Covert Pops The Bloons are invading Stream with their most deadly stealth forces. They must have known the Meerkats were on leave! Pass 50 rounds with a twist: All bloons are Camo and only 1 life!
Fast Upgrades Survive 5 special rounds on Castle where your towers upgrade once for free at the end of each round. Have you got what it takes?
Full House Pass this track on Medium difficulty, but you may have no more than 5 towers or agents on the field at one time!
MOAB Madness $50,000 cash to defeat 50 MOABs. Are you up to the task?
No Escape In this fiendish mission the path has no exit! Survive 13 gruelling rounds as the Bloons whizz round until they are popped. You have 30 seconds to destroy them or you will lose a life every second after that.
Protect Monkey Town Bloons have located the Monkey Town and are attacking on two fronts. Any bloon that touches the Town costs lives, so it's your job to defend the homeland for 65 rounds.
Short-Lived Good old Monkey Lane, except, any tower you place disappears after 10 rounds! Finish Medium difficulty to defeat this dastardly Special Mission.
Special Agents Only For Their Eyes Only! Using only Special Agents, beat the first 50 Rounds on Switch to win.
There Can Be Only One Defeat Bloons Circles on Hard using at most one of each different tower type.
Wizard Lord The amazing 4/4 Wizard Lord must feed on your most expensive tower every other round. If no other towers exist, he cannot feed and the mission is lost. Pass 30 custom rounds of upgraded Bloons.

The mighty Bloonarius has risen from the murky depths and only you can defeat him. It'll take all of your skill to bring down this behemoth, but beware; the more punishment he absorbs the more of his deadly minions he'll summon! Do you have what it takes to send this demon back where he came from? The deadly master of air has descended from the skies to wreak havoc on your monkeys. Vortex’s powerful air attacks will leave your towers stunned and reeling in his wake. Only the best players will be able to survive his onslaught. Can you? Darts bounce harmlessly off Dreadbloon’s tough hide and only the most powerful explosive attacks stand a chance of getting through his thick armour. Do you have enough firepower to cut this giant down to size?
