UPDATES! MORE GAMES
Visit the App Store to check out all the latest Apps from the Ninja Kiwi team.\n\nTap 'GO' to jump to our App Store page. Update 1.1 is here and we've added 2 brand new maps, The Eye and Z Factor. We've also included double replay rewards so you can now earn twice as much Monkey Money when replaying a track. If you just want to jump into a game without delay then check out the new Quick Play mode which will take you straight onto the battlefield! Update 1.2 is here and it's time for some awesome new content. First up is a brand new beginner map, Brick Wall. Can you gain all 3 medals? Due to popular demand we've also added the ability to unlock Sandbox Mode! Sandbox is perfect for experimenting with towers and tactics. More content coming soon! Brand new Tower, Track and Game Mode! First up is the brand new intermediate track, Workshop, a perfect playground for Engineers. Next up is an awesome tower, The Engineer, which can be upgraded to access powerful sentry guns. We've also added the ability to unlock Fast Track. Bypass early rounds and start the game from round 26. It's time for an awesome new Track, Game Mode and Social Functionality! The Great Divide is an advanced track which will prove a real challenge, but so will all existing tracks with brand new Reverse Mode! \nYou can also prove to all your friends that you are number 1 by connecting to Facebook for high score comparisons. Test your skills on the brand new Jungle track featuring 2 seperate paths for added difficulty.\nProud of your achievements in BTD? Reached an exceptionally high round? Now you can share all of your finest moments with friends through the Everyplay video capture system. Play co-op with your friends!\n\nGrab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5 for the first time ever on mobile! Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.\n\nThat is not all. We have also been busy polishing up the visuals to make it much more awesomer and you can now play the game in 15 different languages. It’s time to test your skills on 2 brand new tracks, Country Road and U-Turn.
Country Road is an intermediate track with a reasonable degree of difficulty, while the advanced difficulty of U-Turn will test even the most confident players. Do you have what it takes to gain all 3 medals?
Both tracks are also available for co-op play! New Tower is here! Check out the Bloonchipper and 4 brand new tracks.
That’s right, in this awesome update you can add the Bloonchipper to your arsenal of bloon popping weaponry. Rapidly suck up bloons, shred off some layers and spit out the remains. Perfect for slowing down large groups of bloons. Try it out now on the all new tracks, including Treetop, Maze and the Halloween Themed, Patch and Scorched Earth!
Also, if you want to play private matches in Co-Op without using Facebook then you can now use Game Center to find your friends. Jump in and start up a Co-Op match today. The latest update is a festive present, but the bloons have wrapped it tight with a special bow, and you have to pop bloons to open it.
Happy Holidays from Ninja Kiwi! It’s time for another big content drop as we add 4 new tracks to the mix. 3 Times Round, Lava Fields, Rink Revenge and Runway will test your skills to the limit as they range from Beginner all the way through to Advanced difficulty. 3 of these tracks have also been added into the Co-Op line-up so you can team up with a friend and take them head on together.
Thanks again to all our players and Happy Holidays from the Ninja Kiwi team!
Happy New Year!
It's time for the first content drop of 2014 and to get you started we've added 2 brand new tracks, Water Hazard and Dune Sea.
Both tracks have 2 paths for increased difficulty and at intermediate and advanced difficulties they should provide a good degree of challenge.
Both tracks have also been added to Co-Op lineup so you can tackle them with a friend!
Update 2.6 is here and now that winter is gone we're heating things up with 2 all new tracks, Lobby and Down the Drain. Ranked at beginner and expert difficulty they are guaranteed to provide a challenge for players of all skill levels and Down the Drain is also available for Co-Op play.
Stay tuned for more awesome content coming soon!
Our congratulations go to ADRIANO ROSSI who won our recent Facebook 250k likes competition! Adriano designed our new track Mountain Skull Peak, which you can play in this 2.7 update. Mountain Skull Peak is a beginner track and suitable for all skill levels so be sure to check it out.
For the latest info on all things Ninja Kiwi and to be in with a chance of winning any future competitions be sure to like us on Facebook. As always, stay tuned for more awesome content coming soon! So you think you've mastered the game? You've beaten heaps of tracks, gained a ton of gold medals, and even conquered tracks in reverse. You think you might just be unstoppable...
Well think again as update 2.8 introduces Impoppable mode, an insane new difficulty taking the game to a whole new level of extreme!
More expensive towers, faster and stronger Bloons, and did we mention you can't lose any lives? Challenge yourself with Impoppable, but don't say we didn't warn you.
It’s time to take a spin on the daily challenge wheel! This ancient wheel has been discovered deep in the heart of the Sun God temple and contains 4 new challenges every day. Choose a difficulty then spin the wheel to be presented with a track and 4 towers only. Your task is to complete the challenge using only these towers.
There are 28 challenges to complete each week before the counter resets so don’t delay. Jump in and take on a challenge today! It's time for an all new track, Long Range. This Advanced difficulty track will prove a real challenge with its limited placement area for towers. Long range towers and seeking attacks will work best, so you'll need to be creative with placement in order to stop the Bloons from snaking down the claustrophobic canyon.
Good Luck! Update 2.11 is here and it's time for a brand new track, Checkers. This beginner difficulty track twists and turns, providing a perfect landscape for honing your skills.
We also have some exciting news, the official BTD5 merchandise is now available! Browse our selection of apparel and be sure to check out the awesome Super Monkey plush by visiting the store in game.
Are you brave enough to take on the brand new track Crypt Keeper? Meddlesome ghouls and ghosts guide the Bloons through this spooky graveyard into the crypts and out through a network of graves making this an advanced difficulty path.
Too scared? Team up with a friend and tackle Crypt Keeper in co-op!
It's time for a huge holiday content drop as we add 4 all new tracks into the mix. Have some festive fun in Candy Land and Express Shipping or if you'd prefer to warm up this winter check out Pyramids and Tar Pit.
At this special time of year we'd also like to take the time to thank every single one of our players for being awesome and playing our games. Happy Holidays from all at Ninja Kiwi!
To celebrate the launch of our latest game we're bringing you a brand new intermediate track: Wattle Trees!
Designed especially for Boomerang Monkeys, this is one of several special tracks found in our brand new game Bloons Monkey City.
Prepare to face Poseidon's wrath in the awesome new Odyssey mode!\n\nEach week the Ninja Kiwi community team will hand craft an epic journey worthy of only the most seasoned explorers. Take on up to 5 tracks back to back armed with only a single set of lives.\n\nDo you have what it takes to master the challenge and reap the rewards?
On your marks, get set, go! It's time to race head to head with the Bloons on an all new beginner map, Sprint Track. Compete on hard mode to prove you're the champion and claim the Gold Medal!
Due to popular demand, we've added an auto round start option to the Pause menu. Auto round start means no pause between rounds, so be careful on tough rounds!
Get tangled up in a brand new Advanced map, Battle Knot. The Bloons attack from 3 directions at once to try and tie you up in knots!
If you're coming undone, why not rope in a friend and tackle this map in co-op?
Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Bloons master? Prove it with the brand new Masteries mode!
The Bloons are now tougher than ever so you'd better bring your A game. There's double rewards, increased Monkey Lab research, and 5 new exclusive medals per map to be won in this ultimate challenge.
Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate Bloons master? Prove it with the brand new Masteries mode!
The Bloons are now tougher than ever so you'd better bring your A game. There's double rewards, increased Monkey Lab research, and 5 new exclusive medals per map to be won in this ultimate challenge.
Exclusive for iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S Plus: We've also added Force Touch support. Just push hard on any tower with an ability to activate it immediately! You can also force touch a tower in the sidebar to instantly show it's upgrades.
Daily quests are here! Complete a wide range of tasks from Bloon popping to tower placing and everything in between to win some fantastic rewards.\n\nNew quests will appear every day so there's always something to keep your monkeys busy. Jump to it!
What’s that coming over the hill? Is it a Boss Bloon?
The mighty Boss Bloons from Monkey City are invading BTD5! Look for the button on the track select screen for your chance to challenge one of these terrible behemoths and win some fantastic rewards. New bosses will appear over time so make sure you check back often!
Every day I'm poppin' 'em!
Now there's even more reason to get your daily fix of bloon popping fun, brand new daily rewards! We've filled the Daily Reward Chest with all sorts of exciting goodies including Monkey Money, free towers and Special Agents! Check back every day to see what you get!
We've also added support for a new type of special event so look out for that!
We're making a splash with update 3.4 and a brand new map, River Rapids! This fun Intermediate map features lots of water areas and is great for towers like the Buccaneer.
We've also detected a brand new bloon headed your way - the Golden Bloon! Find and pop this golden trickster in certain maps for Monkey Money and agent rewards. Look out for the Golden Bloon when it invades the track select screen soon!
Things are looking very dark and spooky in Bloons TD 5. It must be Halloween!
Give yourself a scare with the frightfully fun new map, Six Feet, but be warned, this terrifying track is not for the fearful! Give it a try in co-op mode if you don't want to be alone in the dark!
Halloween is over and the ghosts and ghouls have been chased away for another year. Back to the regular bloon popping fun!
Bloons TD5 Stickers are now available exclusively on iOS 10! Whatever your message, say it with bloons! Find them in iMessage now!
Are you the very best? Like no-one ever was? It's time to prove it with the all new weekly leaderboards! Aim for the highest score possible in the weekly task to climb the leaderboards and earn fantastic rewards!
To celebrate the holidays we've also added the brand new Snowy Backyard map. This beginner map is full of festive fun with plenty of space for towers and farms. Try it now and Happy Holidays!
To celebrate the holidays we've added the brand new Snowy Backyard map. This beginner map is full of festive fun with plenty of space for towers and farms. Try it now and Happy Holidays!
You'll be fighting against the currents with this update as we add the brand new Benguela map! This expert level map features multiple entry and exit points and very limited space on land. You'll need your very best water towers to conquer this challenge!
Spring has sprung in BTD 5 with our brand new track: Rabbit Holes! This beginner map will have your monkeys haring around after bloons as they disappear in and out of the ground. Can you keep up?
Head into the trenches with the all new Bloonvasion event! Defeat 50 waves of bloons on an exclusive map to win fabulous prizes. Only certain towers are allowed on the front lines each day so strategy is key! Look out for this limited time event on the track select screen.
Ready your blade and prepare for battle on our brand new map: Siege! The bloons are storming the castle on this tricky advanced map and it's up to the Monkeys of the Round Table to stop them! Can you halt the bloon invasion and save the realm?
It's that time of year when all things ghastly and grim are creeping out after dark and BTD5 is looking scarily spooky. Get caught up in some terrifyingly tricky bloon popping on our all new expert map: Web. Not brave enough to face your fears alone? Bring along a friend for some frightful co-op fun!
It's the festive season in BTD5 but it's not just Santa visiting these houses, it's the bloons! Put them on the naughty list in our new winter beginner map, Present Delivery. Happy holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!
It's time for an all new special event in BTD5: Preferred Monkey! Challenge yourself to complete specific tracks using the preferred monkeys for awesome bonus rewards. What new strategies will you discover?
Spring has sprung in BTD5 which means it's time for a fresh new update!
Take some time to smell the roses as you burst into Bloom, the all new beginner map. Bloons are invading this springtime paradise and it's up to you to clean them out.
Let's get popping!
Prepare for Challenge Monkey! An all new, limited time event that dares you to complete maps using ONLY a hand picked team of monkeys. There are amazing rewards available, if you're up to the challenge!
Are you ready for two new maps? You might get lost in the woods on the expert map Forest Path, and then there is the strangely compelling coastal scenery on the intermediate map Village Shore. Enjoy!
Things are going bump in the night in BTD5 and that can only mean one thing... It's Halloween! This year we've got a whole new event for the spookiest of seasons: Trick or Treat! Challenge yourself to take on 50 scarily difficult rounds with a tricky twist for some amazing rewards. That's not all though, we've also got a monsterous new monkey skin available in the store and a brand new map for you to sink your teeth into!
Take on 25 brutally tough rounds in the ultimate test of your bloon popping skills: The Crucible! Your only chance to defeat these rounds is to harness the Altars of Power and supercharge your towers with blistering speed.
Plus we've added a brand new map, Hearthside, and decked the halls with our festive winter theme! Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!
The golden bananas of Tutankhabloon were lost to the ages... until now!
Explore an ancient treasure trove on a brand new intermediate map, Ancient Tomb! There's room for two on this expedition so why not bring a friend and tackle the tomb in co-op mode!
Spring time is just around the corner so step outside with the brand new intermediate map, Walk in the Park. This fresh new map can be played solo or co-op so grab a friend and picnic while you pop.
We’ve also added private match codes to make jumping into some co-op action even easier!
New Map - Flooded Lane!
Things are looking seriously soggy in everyone's favorite beginner map! Monkey Lane has been flooded! There's water all over the best tower spots making this a much trickier map than before. Bring your Buccaneers and shine up those Subs if you want stand a chance at this watery challenge!
You'll be seeing double in this update as two brand new maps arrive in BTD5. Head in the Clouds is a vertigo inducing intermediate map set high above a bustling city. You'll need both feet firmly on the ground to tackle this challenge. For a more down to earth game, try the new beginner map; Oasis. This tropical paradise might seem serene, but you can never let your guard down when there are Bloons around.
Feel a chill in the air? Winter has arrived in Bloons TD 5! Dive into a winter wonderland in a new beginner map: Snowman. This snowy spectacle has more loops and bends than a festive bow so you'll have plenty of places to put your favorite towers. Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!
Step inside the Forgotten Garden and uncover this all new intermediate map. This old and mysterious greenhouse has plenty of twists and turns for your monkeys to take advantage of, plus a helpful pond for your buccaneers and subs. Can you take advantage of the opportunity and earn all the garden's medals?
The Bloons are not messing around on this one! A map so tough, so brutal, it can only be called EXTREME! For the first time ever, we're adding an all new Extreme difficulty map: Toxic Waste. Four incredibly short paths that only the most skilled monkeys will be able to defend. Luckily, it takes more than some off-color water to scare your subs and buccaneers. And lets face it, you're going to need all the help you can get!
It's update time in BTD5 once again! This time we're bringing you an all new map: Parking Lot. This beginner map features plenty of spaces to park your towers and line up the perfect shot on the Bloons. For extra fun, try car-pooling with a friend in co-op mode!
We're falling into fall in BTD5 with an all new intermediate map: Autumn Leaves! There's a chill in the air so make sure your monkeys are wrapped up warm when they go to take on the bloons amongst piles of freshly fallen leaves.
Snow is falling all around us? Monkeys playing, having fun? It must be the BTD5 winter update! This year we're heading north for a real challenge. A new advanced map: Igloos. The Bloons enter this snow covered landscape from two different directions so you'll need a versatile defense to stop them. Happy Holidays from everyone at Ninja Kiwi!
New year, new map! Step into 2021 with an all new advanced map, Bigfoot. You'll need to put your best foot forward to stomp out the Bloons before they can toe-tally wreck your defenses! Take on this oversized challenge solo or with a friend in co-op mode!
Bring a splash of color to your bloons game in an all new map: Daffodils. The bloons are attacking this springtime sanctuary and its up to you to stop them. Luckily this beginner map has plenty of space for you to bring your flowery firepower to bear. Time to spring into action!
The tide is coming in and bringing with it waves of Bloons! Luckily the monkeys are here to defend the beaches on a new advanced map: Tidal Pools. The path is short so you'll need to make the most of the Monkey Sub friendly pools and central choke point to turn back the tide.
Land Ho! Follow the guiding light of the lighthouse onto an all new advanced map: Land's End. The Bloons have taken a firm hold of this rocky coastline and only your monkeys can send them packing. Buccaneers and Subs can rain down destruction from the sea while your other monkeys attack from inland. Now's your chance to shine!
It's that time of year again where spirits start to walk the earth. It's not just spirits emerging from the dark though, the Bloons are too! Send them back to the other side on an all new advanced map: Day of the Undead. Take on this challenging map solo or make it a real party and bring a friend in co-op mode!
Santa's been busy in his workshop getting ready for the holidays but he'll never finish the toys in time with all these Bloons in the way! Send your monkeys in to help in this all new beginner map: Toyland. Whether you're playing solo or sharing the festive fun in coop mode, everyone at Ninja Kiwi wishes you a Happy Holiday!
Take on the Bloons in the sands of South America in a new beginner map: Nazca Lines. The Bloons are all over these mysterious relics and it's up to you to drive them off. With no water or other obstacles to stand in your way it'll be down to pure popping to bring this inflatable insurgence to an end! Time to sharpen those darts!
Springtime has arrived in BTD5 and the Easter Bunny has been busy! The all new Advanced map Egg Hunt is covered in Easter Eggs so the Monkeys have to be careful where they step! Finding useful places for your towers away from the eggs is sure to be a challenge. Luckily there's a pleasant pond for your Buccaneers and Subs to help out from. Can you master the strategy and earn the medals?
Gather round the warm glow of an all new map: Campfire. This map might look comforting but don't be fooled. It's an Extreme challenge! Three super short paths mean you're going to need a lot of firepower if you want to return from this camping trip with a medal!
It’s that special time of year again and a cool mystery parcel has arrived in the village. However, the Bloons have managed to intercept the delivery and have sealed the gift with a special bow. The Monkeys are having difficulty unwrapping it and they need your help. What’s inside? It's awesome, but you have to pop a bunch of bloons to find out!
In order to assist you in your mission we’ve added a brand new track, North Pole. This beginner track is also available in co-op mode. This holiday is the perfect time to try out co-op matches with friends.
For the holidays, the village has also been given a lick of festive cheer, and it's in that spirit that we want to say thanks to all of our players. We sincerely appreciate your time and your feedback, and we'll do our very best to keep bringing awesome updates and cool new games your way.
Happy Holidays from the Ninja Kiwi team!

Cloud Saves!
Bloons TD 5 now supports cloud saves on Android devices. Go to the settings menu to back up your save data or transfer it to another Android device. You must be signed in to Google Game Services to use the cloud save feature.
We've also added Google Play Achievements! Try and collect them all!

Top-Rated Tower Defense Game
xp XP
Follow Mouse Follow Mouse You have a Heli Pilot! This powerful attack copter has multiple patrol options. Choose between Follow Mouse, Lock'n'Place and Patrol, where it will attack between two set points. Lab upgrades provide a boost in the battlefield every time you play! To fund your research, you need Tokens which you gain by beating tracks and Special Missions. The lab displays how many Tokens are required for the next upgrade. Click each upgrade to learn its benefits. This is the Agents and Abilities deployment bar. From here you can drag Agents onto the battlefield just like regular towers.\n\nAbilities are slightly different. Once you unlock an ability it will be added to the deployment bar and you simply click the icon to activate it. The ability will then go on a cooldown timer and you won't be able to activate it again until the timer resets. Click a tower to overclock... You have a Special Agent. These are once-use items that can help you win. Some items are towers that are placed, others are special powers that are activated. You can see how many of each Special Agent you own by clicking the Special Powers Star button. One of your towers now has an Activated Ability. These are extremely powerful abilities that can be used when you get in trouble. Each ability is on a 'cool-down' before it can be used again. You can use the ability by clicking the ability icons above the deployment bar. You have a Banana Farm! These farms generate bananas automatically each round. Convert the bananas into cash by mousing over the bananas. Don't wait too long - the bananas will spoil after 10 seconds if not collected. Click on info buttons throughout the game to bring up descriptions and explanations Click on the daily reward chest every day to earn more and more free Monkey Money Visit the App Store to check out all the latest Apps from the Ninja Kiwi team.\n\nClick 'GO' to jump to our App Store page. Click & Drop Shoots darts like a machine gun, at any position you mouseover. Grows bananas that you can mouse over to collect for cash. Hotkey: %s Congratulations, you've popped enough Bloons to unwrap the mysterious parcel. Click on the present to uncover the gift inside! Play co-op with your friends!\n\nGrab your sharpest darts and jump into two-player cooperative Bloons TD 5. Featuring custom made maps for co-op chaos, BTD5 Co-op is a brand new challenge for you and your friends. Figure out the best way to work together with your shared money and lives to earn the new achievements and all the Awesome that goes with it.
Armed with sharp acorns, this special agent goes berserk when bloons leak. For a few seconds, he attacks super fast, can spot camo, and pop lead. Pro Upgrade - Anger Mismanagement! Despite counselling the squirrel agent is even angrier. He gets so worked up that every 50 acorns he goes berserk even if bloons haven't leaked, attacking super fast, spotting camo, and popping lead. Tired of picking up all those bananas yourself? So is this guy but at least he's paid to do it. Farmer will auto-gather all bananas in his radius so you don't have to. Pro Upgrade - Banana Cannon! Farmer collect bananas from nearby Farms, then shoots the skins onto the track, making bloons slide back toward the entrance. This agent has a hive of angry bees that zip to their targets and sting bloons until all layers are popped. Stingers can't pop lead or ice but regrower Bloons beware. Pro Upgrade - Swarm! The Swarm Activated Ability launches 100 bees that will seek targets and pop them mercilessly for a short duration. Can't pop lead or ice but regrower bloons beware! Plant this fast-growing bloon killer right on the track. Loses a thorn for each bloon popped, but grows 10 thorns between each round (up to 200). Pro Upgrade - Creepers! Creepers appear every 3 rounds and can grow up to 15 thorns each. Protect them as Creepers are destroyed if stripped of thorns. Main bush still grows 10 thorns per round up to 200. Rapidly sucks up and shreds bloons, spitting what's left out the back. The Bloonsday Device gives you temporary control of the orbital strike satellite, whose beam destroys all bloons and does big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Pro Upgrade - Plasmatic Fusion! Focal doubling at the point of impact leaves a trail of plasma along the strike path, so hot it will continue to damage all bloons and MOAB-classes until spent or dissipated. Shoots a single bomb that explodes in a radius burst. Can pop lead bloons. Throws a single boomerang in an arc, can pop 3 bloons. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Placed directly on the track, these explode after 3 seconds. Shoots a glob of monkey glue that slows a single bloon. Powerful attack helicopter armed with twin dart shooters and multiple patrol options. Temporarily freezes nearby bloons. Frozen bloons are immune to sharp objects. Meerkat Spy has no attack, but instead uses his super keen senses to spot Camo Bloons, granting Camo Detection for all towers within his radius. Pro Upgrade - Cyber Eye! No longer weaponless, the Meerkat Pro can now blast any single bloon into dust and help put the hurt on MOAB-class bloons. Grants camo detection to all towers in his radius. Patrols the skies above the action, blasting the area with 8 powerful darts. Throws magic bolts that can pop 2 bloons each. Shoots a single, heavy dart that can pop up to 5 bloons each. Water only. Uses a powerful nail gun, and builds traps, sentries, and enhancers. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Shoots a single dart that pops a single bloon. Submarine tower that shoots homing darts. Has many powerful upgrades incuding the ability to submerge and become a support tower. Reduces cost of all towers and upgrades in radius by 10%. Launches explosive mortar shells to a single targeted spot. Throws sharp shurikens rapidly and can see camo bloons. Place almost any land tower on water with the Pontoon! Deploy the pontoon on water, then place your land tower on top. Pro Upgrade - Primo Pontoon! In addition to luxury fittings, the Primo Pontoon has an uplink to Monkey Town HQ, granting any attached tower a range bonus. Place on water then place your land tower on top. Nowhere to float your boat? Smart monkeys know they can place a Portable Lake on land, allowing any water unit to be deployed within its waters. Pro Upgrade - Sea Monster! New Activated Ability temporarily awakens the Sea Monster, which bashes nearby bloons, popping 5 layers and sometimes stunning them. Any water unit can be placed in the Lake. These slick prehistoric predators orbit their nest and pop any regular bloons they hit, but they can only pop so many before a new one has to hatch. Pro Upgrade - Radderdactyls! Bigger wing blow back bloons with each flap, and they can pop far more regular bloons before going back to the nest. Placed directly on the track, each pack of spikes can pop 10 bloons. Pops 2 layers off of bloons, with unlimited range. Each round generates piles of road spikes that can pop 5 bloons each. Throws darts bloon-meltingly fast. It's a bird. It's a plane. It's a squadron of flying super-powered laser-beamin' monkeys who destroy every single bloon on screen and do big damage to MOAB-class bloons. Pro Upgrade - Double Storm! A second pass of Super Monkeys follows the first after a short delay, destroying every bloon on screen and damaging MOAB-classes. Shoots 8 tacks spread in all directions, each tack can pop 1 bloon. Tribal Turtle can live on land or water. Throws spears and coconuts, coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons. Pro Upgrade - Ambidexterity! Elite training allows the Turtle Pro to throw spear and coconut simultaneously for maximum bloon hurt. Coconuts do extra damage to ceramic bloons and can pop frozen and lead bloons.
